seniority_level.evidence: Title is Data Engineer with 0-3 years experience, salary range $68,700-$93,900 suggests mid-level, responsibilities mention 'moderate to complex analysis' and coordination duties

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'DATA ENGINEER' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, data warehousing, ETL work, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on 'load profiles', 'cost allocation', 'forecasting', data warehousing solutions, and business intelligence dashboards suggests batch processing for analytics rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'coordinating and supervising', 'cross-functional teams', 'project workstreams', and acting as 'liaison between Department and Information Technology' - technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned, focus on 'existing platform', 'database performance', and traditional data warehousing suggests on-premise infrastructure

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job description

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on 'load profiles', 'forecasting sales', 'automating reporting requirements', and scheduled analytics suggests batch processing rather than streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific workflow orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, etc.)

storage_layer.evidence: Strong emphasis on 'data warehousing solutions', 'relational database management systems (RDBMS)', and business intelligence tools suggests traditional data warehouse approach

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'El Paso, TX' with onsite work model, suggesting local/regional requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: US-based utility company serving Texas and New Mexico, no timezone flexibility mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite position in El Paso, TX with no remote work options suggests relocation would be necessary for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, typical for utility companies to require work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: Standard employment requirement for authorized to work in US, no citizenship requirement specified

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position with salary range and benefits structure suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No specific benefits mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression or growth path mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or working with senior people mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers or role changes mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of required skills (PowerBI, SQL, R, Python) and preferred qualifications (process improvement, business background), balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineer role with clear responsibilities around data pipelines, analytics, and reporting - not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (PowerBI, SQL, R, Python, data warehousing) are reasonable for mid-level data engineer with 0-3 years experience
